yoshida.shapes

Class Sphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • yoshida.shapes.Shapes
      • yoshida.shapes.Sphere

  • public class Sphere
extends Shapes
    Models a sphere
    Version:
    9/22/15
    Author:
    Ryan Yoshida

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sphere()
      Creates a new instance of a sphere with radius 0 and at location (0,0,0)
      Sphere(Circle c)
      Creates a new instance of a sphere based off a circle
      Sphere(float x, float y, float z, float radius)
      Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius
      Sphere(float x, float y, float z, float radius, float color)
      Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color
      Sphere(float x, float y, float z, float radius, float color1, float color2, float color3)
      Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color
      Sphere(float x, float y, float z, float radius, float color, float shineX, float shineY, float shineRadius)
      Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color and creates a glare at a specified point with a specified radius
      Sphere(float x, float y, float z, float radius, float color1, float color2, float color3, float shineX, float shineY, float shineRadius)
      Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color and creates a glare at a specified point with a specified radius

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sphere

        public Sphere()
        Creates a new instance of a sphere with radius 0 and at location (0,0,0)
        Postcondition
        spheres color set to black

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(Circle c)
        Creates a new instance of a sphere based off a circle
        Parameters:
        c - The circle in which the sphere is based off of
        Postcondition
        spheres color set to black, the stroke is set same as fill

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float x,
              float y,
              float z,
              float radius)
        Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the sphere
        y - y-coordinate of the sphere
        z - z-coordinate of the sphere
        radius - radius of the sphere
        Postcondition
        spheres color is black, strokeWeight is 5

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float x,
              float y,
              float z,
              float radius,
              float color)
        Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the sphere
        y - y-coordinate of the sphere
        z - z-coordinate of the sphere
        radius - radius of the sphere
        color - sets the color of the sphere for (RGB)
        Postcondition
        stroke is set same as fill, stroke weight is 5

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float x,
              float y,
              float z,
              float radius,
              float color1,
              float color2,
              float color3)
        Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the sphere
        y - y-coordinate of the sphere
        z - z-coordinate of the sphere
        radius - radius of the sphere
        color - sets the color of the sphere for (R, G, B)
        Postcondition
        stroke is set same as fill, stroke weight is 5

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float x,
              float y,
              float z,
              float radius,
              float color,
              float shineX,
              float shineY,
              float shineRadius)
        Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color and creates a glare at a specified point with a specified radius
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the sphere
        y - y-coordinate of the sphere
        z - z-coordinate of the sphere
        radius - radius of the sphere
        color - sets the color of the sphere for (RGB)
        shineX - x-coordinate, where (0,0) is the center corner of the sphere, of the glare from light
        shineY - y-coordinate, where (0,0) is the center corner of the sphere, of the glare from light
        shineRadius - radius of the glare from light
        Postcondition
        stroke is set same as fill, stroke weight is 5

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(float x,
              float y,
              float z,
              float radius,
              float color1,
              float color2,
              float color3,
              float shineX,
              float shineY,
              float shineRadius)
        Creates a new instance of a sphere at location(x,y,z) with the given radius and given color and creates a glare at a specified point with a specified radius
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the sphere
        y - y-coordinate of the sphere
        z - z-coordinate of the sphere
        radius - radius of the sphere
        color - sets the color of the sphere for (R, G, B)
        shineX - x-coordinate, where (0,0) is the center of the sphere, of the glare from light
        shineY - y-coordinate, where (0,0) is the center corner of the sphere, of the glare from light
        shineRadius - radius of the glare from light
        Postcondition
        stroke is set same as fill, stroke weight is 5

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(float x,
                             float y,
                             float z)
        Returns a boolean true if the point given is inside the sphere
        Parameters:
        x-x-coordinate - to check
        y-y-coordinate - to check
        z-z-coordinate - to check
        Returns:
        returns true if point give is inside the sphere

      • increaseGlare

        public void increaseGlare(float amount)
        Makes the glare much bigger
        Parameters:
        amount-amount - to increase radius of the glare

      • moveGlareBy

        public void moveGlareBy(float x,
                        float y)
        Moves the location of the glare by the amount given
        Parameters:
        x-amount - to move the glare along the x-axis
        y-amount - to move the glare along the y-axis

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet brush)
        Draws the sphere on the PApplet
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shapes
        Parameters:
        brush-PApplet - drawn on
        Postcondition
        strokeWeight = 4, fill = noFill, stroke = color of the sphere
